og.Description: We often report on cases in which employers are held liable for alleged wage and hour violations. Well, just as the pennant race has provided some surprises this year, so did the 2nd Circuit in a recent decision involving Major League Baseball (MLB).
og.Title: FLSA: 2nd Circuit court hits home run for employers

article_metadata.description: Latest HR News - Human resources News on Minimum Wage
